description:
Cubchoo, known as the Chill Pokémon, is based on a polar bear cub. Cubchoo is constantly plagued by a cold and a runny nose. It will sniff up its mucus during attacks and then use it to fight with. When it becomes sicker and the mucus becomes too runny, its ice attacks become weaker.
Cubchoo were given out for a promotional event in the games Pokémon Black and Pokémon White in Japan from October 22, 2010 to November 29, 2010.
name: Kumasyun
